overview_of_class: This course surveys theory and methods for the analysis of categorical response and count data. Topics covered include the exact and approximate inference for contingency tables, logistic and Poisson regression, ordinal and multinomial logit models.
name: Advanced Qualitative Data Analysis
title: WCAS STAT 455-0-1 Advanced Qualitative Data Analysis
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: REASON: Pre-registration is not allowed for this class. Please try again during regular registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course surveys theory and methods for the analysis of categorical response and count data. Topics covered include the exact and approximate inference for contingency tables, logistic and Poisson regression, ordinal and multinomial logit models.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: Regression analysis and maximum likelihood methods of statistical theory.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Grading: Based on assignments, projects, and presentation.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Required: Agresti, A. (2002) Categorical Data Analysis, 2nd edition, New York: Wiley.

subject: STAT
